issue.title: [R] test for slice functions fail on builds without Datasets capability
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-18057](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-18057). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The changes in ARROW-13766 introduced a test which depends on datasets functionality being enabled - we should skip this on CI builds where it is not.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-18057?focusedCommentId=17617884) by Neal Richardson (npr):*
Issue resolved by pull request 14418
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/14418>
